Oasis Singles

Chart Performance Overview

UK Number One Singles

  • Go Let It Out (2000)
  • The Hindu Times (2002)
  • Lyla (2005)
  • The Importance of Being Idle (2005)

Sales Achievements

  • Total UK Singles Sales: Over 21 million
  • Most Weeks on Chart: Wonderwall (76 weeks)
  • Fastest-Selling: D'You Know What I Mean?

Supersonic (1994)

Single Statistics

  • Release Date: April 11, 1994
  • UK Chart Position: #31
  • Weeks on Chart: 10
  • Sales: Over 215,000 copies (UK)
  • Parent Album: Definitely Maybe
